channel.title: Games on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Games on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Legends - Johnan Legendarian
item.description: This is the first game in a series of Legends. An epic adventure in search of riches and glory! Follow Johnan in his quest for lost cities, fighting his way through mythical creatures from the dawn of times. Win more than 5000X your bet in this high volatility 5x3 video slot game. The game features 10 pay lines counting from left to right, Wilds, scatters, and 2 bonus games with free spins.
